original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id =c.UserId AND c.UserId = p.OwnerUserId AND p.OwnerUserId = v.UserId AND v.UserId = b.UserId AND c.Score=1 AND p.Score>=-2 AND p.Score<=23 AND p.ViewCount<=2432 AND p.CommentCount=0 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=113 AND u.Views>=0 AND u.Views<=51
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 1
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) >= -2 AND CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) <= 23 AND posts.ViewCount <= 2432 AND posts.CommentCount = 0 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3E2.UserId=E4.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 113 AND (CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) <= 51)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E2E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E3E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E3E2E4.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E2E4E5 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E2E4E5.UserId)
